title: daxanax
author: daxanax
content: Hi there!I am currently looking to sell my bc.game account as I am looking to quit gambling. I have wagered around 250k on there, hence being VIP level 34. With that VIP level you gain many benefits and bonus rewards, so if you are looking to gamble with a head start this account is for you! You will get big monthly bonuses, weekly bonuses, a Super Spin for a chance to win 3 BTC, much better BCD rewards, a recharge option after you wager a certain amount of money for a portion of your wagers given back to you daily and many more exclusive VIP rewards!  Price: 5.500$ (Negotiable)You will get full access of the account with credentials you can change.Feel free to contact me if you have any questions!
